GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
x86/pmem: Fix platform-device leak in error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 0b7f674c12c058afbb5ed9d7ba0f650a4eff2055, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit 7a67832c7e44c20935c5d6f2264035a0f7bf0d8f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: x86/pmem: Fix platform-device leak in error path
